## GitHub

> Get user info from a GitHub username

## Install

```
$ pip install ghuser
```

## Usage

```python
import ghuser as user

user.get('iamyoginth')

"""
{
   'username': 'iamyoginth',
   'bio': 'Open-Source Enthusiast ‚Ä¢ Developer & Toolmaker ‚Ä¢ Pythonista üêç ‚Ä¢ Issue Resolver ‚Ä¢ Support me on Patreon: yoginth ‚≠ê',
   'company': None,
   'location': 'Parallel Universe',
   'repos': 54,
   'followers': 2,
   'following': 11,
   'website_url': 'https://t.me/yoginth',
   'id': 26025640,
   'avatar_url': 'https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/26025640?v=4',
   'web_url': 'https://github.com/iamyoginth'
}
"""
```
